mapper.sql: id, account, password, leader_id, createDate, losingEffect, logicDelete, disable,isActive,hasEmail, member,passwordkey,lastlogintime,lastloginip,lastloginsession,ftype
mapper.select: SELECT TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,MAX(lastuptime),NOW()) from t_amz_auth_api_timelimit t WHERE t.apiname='createReport'
select p.location image, u.* from t_userinfo u left join t_picture p on p.id=u.picture where u.id=#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
select distinct s.shop_id from t_user_shop s where s.user_id= #{userId,jdbcType=CHAR}

select t.id, t.account, t.password,t.salt, t.leader_id, t.createDate, t.losingEffect, t.logicDelete, t.disable,t.isActive,t.hasEmail, t.member,t.passwordkey,t.lastlogintime,t.lastloginip,t.lastloginsession,t.ftype from t_user t left join t_userinfo u on t.id=u.id where (t.account=#{account,jdbcType=CHAR} or (u.email=#{account,jdbcType=CHAR} and t.hasEmail=1)) and t.logicDelete!=1

select distinct a.* from t_authority a left join (select r.authority_id from t_role_authority r inner join t_user_role u on r.role_id=u.role_id and u.user_id=#{userid,jdbcType=CHAR}) V on V.authority_id=a.id where V.authority_id is null

SELECT u.id,u.account,i.name from t_user u LEFT JOIN t_userinfo i ON i.id=u.id WHERE u.leader_id =( SELECT user_id FROM t_user_shop WHERE shop_id=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} LIMIT 1) OR u.id=( SELECT user_id FROM t_user_shop WHERE shop_id=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} LIMIT 1) AND u.`disable`=0 AND u.losingEffect>NOW() AND u.logicDelete=0
and u.name like #{search,jdbcType=CHAR}
